description: Mosques and transport hubs will get extra police as the Hanau killings are seen as racist terror.
title: Hanau: Germany boosts security amid far-right threat
title_page: Hanau: Germany boosts security amid far-right threat - BBC News
maintext: "It was a bloodbath... We were all lying on top of each other. The guy lying under me had a hole in his neck, he said 'I can't breathe, I can't feel my tongue'," Muhammad recalled through tears. He said he told the young man to recite a final prayer, which he did.
